  src/source/common/uvector.h
  src/source/common/uvectr32.cpp
  src/source/common/uvectr32.h
  src/source/common/uvectr64.cpp
  src/source/common/uvectr64.h
  src/source/common/wintz.cpp
  src/source/common/wintz.h
  src-dat/icudt65l_dat.c
  )

add_library(icu STATIC
  ${icu_FILES}
  )

format_output_name(icu "icu")

if(MSVC)
  target_compile_definitions(icu PRIVATE _CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS)
  target_compile_options(icu PRIVATE /source-charset:UTF-8 /execution-charset:UTF-8 /validate-charset)
endif()

target_compile_definitions(icu
  PUBLIC U_COMMON_IMPLEMENTATION
  PUBLIC U_STATIC_IMPLEMENTATION
  )
target_include_directories(icu
  PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/source/common
  )

if(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS AND UNIX)
  set_target_properties(icu PROPERTIES POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)
endif()
